arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How Bolton Wanderers' players fared in 5-1 Arsenal defeat
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers went out of the Carabao Cup with a 5-1 defeat at Premier League Arsenal. But how did we score the players?

arts.ttl: Ethan Nwaneri and Jack Porter take the limelight in Arsenal’s win over Bolton
arts.sum: Nwaneri netted twice while Declan Rice, Raheem Sterling and Kai Havertz were also on target.

arts.ttl: Arsenal team news: 16-year-old in goal as Raheem Sterling makes full debut
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta makes sweeping changes for Wednesday's EFL Cup third-round tie with Bolton Wanderers, where four teenagers will make their full debuts.

arts.ttl: Arsenal vs Bolton: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: After an extremely challenging week, Arsenal return to action on Wednesday evening when they host Bolton Wanderers in the Carabao Cup third round. Arsenal predicted lineup vs Bolton (4-3-3) : Porter; White, Kacurri, Kiwior, Lewis-Skelly; Jorginho, Nwaneri, Oulad M'Hand; Saka, Jesus, Sterling.
